phrases: Once I get my Quirk, I want to be like him, too!
You should probably give it up.
How can you even stand in the same ring as me?
What the hell can you do?
Even if that is what everyone thinks...
Even if I do not have a Quirk, can I become a hero?
Can even someone without a Quirk be like you?
It might have been because I do not have a Quirk,
but I am always made fun of...
But I think saving people is super cool.
Saving people with a fearless smile.
I want to be the greatest hero, like you...!
If it were not for that bastard...
Hey, Katsuki, are not you and Midoriya childhood friends?
You went a little overboard today.
It is his fault for getting in my way.
Do not let it get to you.
It is just that it is been my goal ever since I was little.
I will not know unless I try...
He is an idiot dreaming like a kid!
Just watching him pisses me off!
Then, why do not we go to the arcade for a change of pace?
You will come, too, right, Katsuki?
Then let us go to the one in front of the station.
There is lots of prey there.
If we get caught, it will end up on my record!
An invisible cloak with a great Quirk!
You know how the guys at the pool are constantly flexing and posturing?
He saves everyone with a smile...
Now that you have seen me like this, young man...
It is an injury I got from an enemy's attack five years ago.
Half of my respiratory organs were destroyed...
I have become emaciated from repeated surgeries and the aftereffects.
Right now, I can only work as a hero...
Was that when you fought Toxic Chainsaw?
But a punk like that could not defeat me.
This fight was not made public to the world.
I asked that it not be made public.
I will save people with a smile!
The Symbol of Peace cannot be daunted by evil.
I smile to show the pressure of heroes...
Pros are always risking their lives.
I cannot simply say, You can become a hero even without power.
If you want to help others,
then you could also become a police officer.
They are often teased because they get villains delivered to their doorstep,
but that is also a fine occupation.
It is not bad to dream.
But you also have to consider what is realistic, young man.
Now, I need to quickly get this guy...
What hero will go to the scene?
I cannot simply say, You can become a hero even without power.
I will not let sewage like this swallow me!
With this Quirk and power, I can get revenge on that guy!
Could he be a big-shot villain?
W-Wait... I need there to be at least two lanes!
I am not good with explosions!
I will leave it to someone else for today!
I have my hands full fighting the fire.
The fire truck's not here yet?
He is sticky and hard to grab,
and a child with a strong Quirk is struggling against him.
Thanks to that, it is a minefield.
It is hard to do anything against this triple play!
There is no one who can take care of this at the scene right now!
All we can do is wait for someone with a more suitable Quirk!
Let us hold back the damage until then!
Do not worry, I am sure someone will be here soon!
I feel bad for that child, but he will just have to bear it a little longer.
If only I had enough power to blow that guy away!
Hey, does not it look kind of bad?
I was too distracted by my time limit!
I cannot believe I made a mistake like this after admonishing that fan.
He still cannot face reality, even though he is already a third year in junior high.
It is time for you to think seriously about your future.
You also have to consider what is realistic.
Even a top pro said it.
That is why you were trying so desperately.
You were averting your eyes, not looking at reality.
Is this where the explosion earlier was...?
Hang on, does that mean I came out of habit without noticing?
It will just feel meaningless right now.
Did it get away from All Might?!
Why are not the heroes doing anything?
Apparently the villain caught a junior high schooler.
It is been like that for a while.
It is been like that for a while?
How can they bear that suffocation?
I thought I would die after a few seconds.
Anyway, was not that villain the one All Might was chasing earlier?
I think I saw him earlier.
Then what is All Might doing?!
All we can do is wait for a hero with a more suitable Quirk!
My legs moved on their own!
I do not know why, though!
I think there were various reasons.
You should probably give it up.
How can you even stand in the same ring as me?
He saves everyone with a smile...
You looked like you were asking for help...
Do not get in my way!
Even though I admonished you, I was not putting what I said into practice!
Pros are always risking their lives!
Do not tell me it is from the wind pressure just now?
With just his right fist, he changed the weather!
That is All Might for ya!
and safely delivered it to the police.
Jeez, there is a limit to how rash you can be!
There was absolutely no reason for you to put yourself in danger!
I got majorly scolded by the heroes...
Once you are a pro, please come to my agency!
You will definitely be an excellent sidekick!
I wanted to apologize to All Might...
I will try sending him a message on his website when I get home.
I never asked you for help!
And you did not help me!
You are a Quirkless failure playing without a full deck!
Do not think you can look down on me!
Are you trying to make me owe you?!
Do not look down on me!
It is just as Kacchan said.
It is not like I accomplished anything, or changed anything.
Now I can think of a realistic future...
You were surrounded by reporters until just now...
Getting away from them was a piece of cake.
I come with thanks, a correction, and a suggestion.
If you had not been there...
If you had not told me about your life...
I would have turned into a guy in a bodysuit who was all talk.
It was my fault in the first place.
I got in the way of your work...
It was because it was none other than the timid, Quirkless you at the scene...
Top heroes have stories about them from their school days.
Most of their stories have one thing in common.
Their bodies moved before they had a chance to think.
That was true for you, too, was not it?
Back then, what I wanted you to say...
The words I wanted to hear were...
By the way, I forgot to mention that this is the story of how I became the greatest hero.
Young man, you are worthy to inherit my power.
Take my Quirk, One For All!
With this, I can become a hero, too, right?
Episode 2. What It Takes to Be a Hero
Episode 2. What It Takes to Be a Hero
Quickly stretch out arms (vines) to make the opponent flinch back, and then use that opening to restrain them
Quickly stretch out arms (vines) to make the opponent flinch back, and then use that opening to restrain them
